identifier.raw:
not ( contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Draft") ||
  contains([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Draft-Change requested")
|| contains([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Saved") 
  )

contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Draft")
|| contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Saved")

contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Approved")
|| contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Paid")

contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Rejected")
|| contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Due")
|| contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Overdue")

contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Pending Approval")
|| contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Submitted")

formula.raw:
not(contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Draft")) &&
not(contains ([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status] , "Saved")) 
&& not(isMemberOfGroup("Deferred payments Admin"))

not(contains([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status],"Draft")) && 
not(contains([SharePoint Columns].[Payment Status],"Draft"))
